vendor_name: Antigon Urban Chic Hotel - Leading Hotels of the World
title: Grand Opening: Stay in One of the Leading Hotels of the World
description: Get a taste of Greek history in the port city of Thessaloniki, staying in five-star luxury at the brand new Antigon Urban Chic Hotel - part of the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World collection. Be amongst the first to stay in this exclusive hotel in a beautiful new guest room with daily breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a complimentary cocktail each and complimentary parking. Upgrade to experience Junior Suite luxury with a three-course dining experience.

title: Greek Spa Break with Daily Breakfast, Cocktail and Dinner
description: A Greek paradise awaits at the Dion Palace Resort & Spa, just one hour from Thessaloniki. With breathtaking views of Mount Olympus, comfortable rooms and a luxury on-site spa, it’s the perfect place to unwind. Enjoy daily breakfast and dinner included, plus a daily cocktail for two, one spa access pass per person, a bottle of wine on arrival and more.

title: Thessaloniki 1920s Heritage Escape near Old Town with Rooftop Terrace
description:
Immerse yourself in contemporary luxury at this boutique masterpiece that combines industrial chic with mid-century elegance. Begin your day with specialty coffee and locally-inspired breakfast at The Modernist Cafe, then soak in breathtaking sunset views from the rooftop terrace. Relax in thoughtfully designed spaces where raw concrete meets soft linens and bespoke furniture.

The Modernist Thessaloniki sits in the hip Ladadika district, where traditional tavernas rub shoulders with modern art galleries and wine bars. Just steps from the city's coolest haunts and treasures, you're a three-minute wander from the bustling Aristotelous Square, or you can enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront to the iconic White Tower.

title: Cosy Thessaloniki Stay in the Centre of Greece’s Ancient Port City
description: If you're looking to explore Greece’s heritage, Holiday Inn Thessaloniki, an IHG Hotel has the central address you need to hit all the sights. Tickling the coast of the Aegean Sea, this resilient city is home to remnants of Roman, Ottoman and Byzantine empires whose ruins can be found sprinkled across archaeological sights and museums. Continue exploring into the evening and you'll find a flourishing nightlife scene with countless bars and eateries, or chose to eat in at Aristotelis restaurant.
location_description: Holiday Inn Thessaloniki, an IHG Hotel

title: Boutique Thessaloniki Luxury with Gourmet Restaurant
description: Relax into boutique European luxury at The Excelsior Hotel Thessaloniki, where heritage touches meet modern design. Explore the vibrant city that many consider the cultural capital of Greece, blessed with ancient monuments, broad sea views and delectable cuisine. Your carefully renovated boutique hotel boasts beautiful French balconies and stunning marble bathrooms in each room, an in-house restaurant serving Greek and international culinary delights, and plenty of space to get comfortable and relax.
offer_address: 10 Komninon Street & 23 Mitropoleos Avenue, Thessaloniki 546 24, Greece

title: Boutique Stylish Mainland Greece Stay with Buffet Breakfast & Sparkling Sea Views
description: Where modern comforts combine with rich culture and classic design, ON Residence boasts stylish spaces overlooking the sparkling Thermaikos Gulf, perfect for respite and rejuvenation. Explore the historic beauty of mainland Greece and return back to a luxurious stay complete with delicious cocktails at the sleek and modern Tiger Loop bar, or a bite of delectable Greek fare at the hotel’s famed restaurant; Olympos Naoussa.
